description:
Works in Speech Dispatcher but for some reason takes over so you can't alternate back to espeak, at least on Kubuntu 22.04.
Voices sound great, downloading voices works great.
Worked well for TTS in Firefox in reader mode.
Setting the speed/pitch doesn't seem to do anything though. But for free TTS with great voices it's hard to beat.
Does Have a glitch working with Calibre e-book reader where once it starts reading it won't stop unless you reboot. Close the e-book reader, try to kill the process... it just keeps reading.
Going to uninstall to try some other things as having e-books read to me is my primary use case but may come back to this as the voices are outstanding and try it with another reader.
Es excelente, funciona muy bien. primero hay que instalar el paquete python3-speechd y luego el paquete speech-dispatcher.
descarga la voz pero no cuenta con un espacio para escribir o una opción para que lea algún texto, desconozco su uso.
summary: un aplicación que me deja sin opinion
